name: Set of 6 Samhain Wine Glass Charms!
description: These antique silver wine glass charms are the perfect addition to your Feast of the Dead, Dumb Supper, or Halloween party. Each person gets a different charm for their wine, martini or champagne glass so you'll always know which glass is yours. The set comes with six charms: a pumpkin, witches hat, skeleton, scarecrow, ghost and bat. View more photos on our Facebook page. LIMITED STOCK! ORDER NOW!!

name: Pentacle Religious Tolerance Charm Ribbon
description:
Pagan Purple Ribbons are handmade ribbons for Pagans, Wiccans, Witches, and all followers of Earth based religions who want to promote religious tolerance and bring about awareness. 

Each ribbon is cut to the same length, edges singed to prevent fraying, and assembled with love. A silver pentacle is sewn on to the front of the ribbon and a safety pin is fixed to the back. 

All ribbons are blessed before being sent out. Wear your ribbon proudly on September 21-22. A portion of every sale goes to charity.

Approx. 12 x 7 cm - sizes may vary slightly as these are handmade

(Please not ribbon is all the same colour, dark areas on photo are just shadows)
